title: Olivia Munn
summary: Lisa Olivia Munn (born July 3, 1980) is an American actress and former television host. After interning at a news station in Tulsa, she moved to Los Angeles where she began her professional career as a television host for the gaming network G4, primarily on the series Attack of the Show! from 2006 until 2010. She was also a correspondent on The Daily Show with Jon Stewart from 2010 to 2011. She is also known for her portrayal of Sloan Sabbith in Aaron Sorkin's HBO political drama series The Newsroom (2012â€“2014), and appeared on the series for all three seasons.
